name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas R. WARE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas R. WARE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Wendell G. Freeland, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Stella L. Smetanka, Asst. Dist. Atty., Kernel Alexander Mericli, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
435 A.2d 179
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas R. WARE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 17, 1981.
Decided Oct. 8, 1981.
Wendell G. Freeland, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Stella L. Smetanka, Asst. Dist. Atty., Kernel Alexander Mericli, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
